subject: Pédales frein
description_text:
﻿Bonjour 
La pédale de frein ne fonctionne pas, l’accélérateur fonctionne bien
Est ce que je renvoie ensemble 
Mon numéro de commande #SSN5289
Merci
ORDER #SSN5289
Serge COLLETTE
1 Rue de l’Église 
54290 Gripport 
Tel: 0680004294

conversations.body_text: Hi serge COLLETTE,    If you have adjusted the brake’s mechanical structure or damping, please click the Offset button in the software and follow the on-screen steps to reset the initial pressure signal (ensure the white bar returns to 0%), then recalibrate the pedal.  If the issue persists, please record a video and share it with us via Google Drive, making sure the link access is set to viewable, so we can further analyze and assist you.

Bonjour,
Le câble du load cell a été pincé, on le sent en le touchant et ce qui donne aucune information 
Je ne peux pas faire de vidéo 
Veuillez m’envoyer un bon de retour 
Merci 
Serge COLLETTE
1 Rue de l’Église 
54290 Gripport 
Tel: 0680004294

> 
> ﻿
> Hi serge COLLETTE,
> 
> If you have adjusted the brake’s mechanical structure or damping, please click the Offset button in the software and follow the on-screen steps to reset the initial pressure signal (ensure the white bar returns to 0%), then recalibrate the pedal.
> If the issue persists, please record a video and share it with us via Google Drive, making sure the link access is set to viewable, so we can further analyze and assist you.
>

Hi serge COLLETTE,  We will send you a new brake sensor replacement tomorrow. Could you please confirm whether you are able to replace it yourself? If needed, we can also provide installation guidance.

Merci beaucoup pour votre action
Je suis capable de le changer
Merci à vous 
Serge COLLETTE
1 Rue de l’Église 
54290 Gripport 
Tel: 0680004294
